comment.author: 63385174@N06
comment._content: This was No, 3 Circular Quay Fire Station and not the Headquarters Fire Station. Headquarters Fire Station was at 213-215 Castlereagh Street, and is now known as No. 1 City of Sydney Fire Station although the original 1888 section of the building is no longer part of the fire fighting operations.
